overview: Nadia Jay: Young wife married to older man cheats with his son and pays the price. Chanell Heart: 3rd date, time for sex, right? Oh, but she's a virgin. What's a brother to do? Ana Foxxx: What do you do when your girl can't cook? Man got to have sex! Lisa Tiffian: My girl caught me cheating, now she's fucking my best friend. That ain't right!
title: Black Couples
